Space Genomics

03 Sep 2016

The first genome in space was sequenced using the Oxford Nanopore MinION sequencer. This sequencer is USB powered, and looks something like this

# NOTE: Size this appropriately

The astronaut used the MinION to sequence the genome of in "space", but under the controlled environment of the space station (ISS). As expected this gave pretty similar results when compared to the same sequencing run back home(planet earth).
